query.description: If Integer matchday is null then standings for last matchday will be returned.
contains name of groups with ,(comma) as delimiter (e.g. "A,B,D"). If groupNames is empty or null then standings for all groups will be returned

request.description:
parameter groupNames contains name of groups with ,(comma) as delimiter (e.g. "A,B,D"). If groupNames is empty or null then standings for all groups will be returned.
If Integer matchday is null then standings for last matchday will be returned.
